name: EightBall
0:
”Alexa, open Eight Ball”
”Alexa, ask Eight Ball if I'm going to win the lottery”
”Will aliens ever visit earth?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: eight ball
des:
Need an answer to life's greatest yes/no questions? Just ask the Eight Ball! This skill was specifically designed to make your Echo Spot look like an Eight Ball, but it will also work with any Alexa device.

Go ahead - ask Alexa your burning questions.

This is an unofficial skill, not sponsored, endorsed, or owned by Mattel.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
